column4: I compiled a 2.6.20 kernel on a ubuntu dapper and I got this error at boot: udevplug make-queue unable to create /dev/.udev/queue :-(
dunno if you'll get 2.6.20 to work with dapper
... you mean that is a coimmon problem in ubuntu dapper?
udev is going through major rework between versions atm, & tracks new kernels, so I'm not that surprised it hasn't worked
